name: Aung San Suu Kyi
office: President of the National League for Democracy
predecessor2: Thein Nyunt, Soe Maung, Soe Thein, Aung Min, Hla Tun
office4: Minister of Electric Power and Energy
predecessor4: Khin Maung Soe (Electric Power), Zeya Aung (Energy)
office6: General Secretary of the National League for Democracy
office8: Member of the Burmese House of Representatives, for Kawhmu
alma_mater: University of Delhi, St Hugh's College, Oxford, University of London
awards: Rafto Prize, Sakharov Prize, Nobel Peace Prize, Jawaharlal Nehru Award, International Simón Bolívar Prize, Olof Palme Prize, Bhagwan Mahavir World Peace, Congressional Gold Medal
